attributes.action: Reduce fuel duty on E5 petrol when E10 becomes standard at fuel pumps.
attributes.additional_details: Owners of E10 incompatible classic and future classic vehicles should not be made to pay more for fuel. This should help to preserve our motoring heritage and many of these vehicles have very low usage in comparison to many more numerous modern cars.
attributes.background: Reduce the fuel duty on premium E5 petrol, so prices become closer to those for standard, when E10 becomes standard at fuel pumps.
